argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islininds.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | islininds.z | |- Z = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 3 |  | islininds.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 4 |  | islininds.e | |- E = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 |  | islininds.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_linindsv | |- ( S linIndS M -> ( S e. _V /\ M e. _V ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_islininds | |- ( ( S e. _V /\ M e. _V ) -> ( S linIndS M <-> ( S e. ~P B /\ A. f e. ( E ^m S ) ( ( f finSupp .0. /\ ( f ( linC ` M ) S ) = Z ) -> A. x e. S ( f ` x ) = .0. ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( S linIndS M -> ( S linIndS M <-> ( S e. ~P B /\ A. f e. ( E ^m S ) ( ( f finSupp .0. /\ ( f ( linC ` M ) S ) = Z ) -> A. x e. S ( f ` x ) = .0. ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ibi | |- ( S linIndS M -> ( S e. ~P B /\ A. f e. ( E ^m S ) ( ( f finSupp .0. /\ ( f ( linC ` M ) S ) = Z ) -> A. x e. S ( f ` x ) = .0. ) ) ) |
